title: 'It Is Hell Out Here,' Says Liberian Official
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath talks to Gyude Moore, deputy chief of staff to Liberia's president, who recently wrote a passionate open letter appealing for urgent help to aid those suffering from Ebola in Monrovia.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
